Description 
The fastest and most complete protection against online threats is available 

Norton Internet Security offers the fastest and most reliable protection against online threats. Protect your computer network, your online activities and your identity with innovative detection technologies optimized to combat aggressive attacks and present. The Norton security system is a multilayer technology features enhanced protection that work together to provide you with complete protection to help you detect and remove identified threats before they damage your computer. 

Stops online identity theft, identified viruses, hackers, bots, spyware and Trojans while minimizing performance impact and without the need to intrude on your way. Improved technology of Norton Safe Web blocks online attacks before they can infect your computer, so you can browse and shop online with confidence. 

Helps prevent threats from accessing the computer through vulnerabilities in your operating system, applications and browsers. Checks downloads before you install and run. Even warns of unsafe web sites alongside search results. The new Norton Insight System ensures strong protection that sheds light on the CPU resources and memory. It offers faster installation time, the boot time faster, faster analysis and lower memory requirements than any Internet security package. 

Provides information on threats and easy to understand performance to help prevent future infections and keep your computer running faster. With Norton Internet Security have more than just a program. You get Symantec's global network in response to your security, support and service resources and ability to work together to steer clear of threats. 

Norton Internet Security protects your computer, network and your identity with innovative detection technologies optimized to combat today's aggressive attacks. Norton Internet Security will provide the fastest and highest level of protection against all known threats online. 

Key Features 
Designed for speed 

It has proven to be the fastest and most complete package of security available. 
Norton Insight technology-driven intelligence is directed only to those files at risk, and offers faster scanning, more sparse and shorter. 
Installs in under one minute on average requires less than 7 MB of memory. 
Date protection 
It offers protection with rapid pulse updates with an interval of 5 to 15 minutes. 
The Norton Protection System provides multilayered protection technologies that work in concert to stop threats before they act. 
Real-time SONAR (Symantec Online Network for Advanced Response) helps prevent bots from taking control of your computer 
Prevents threats from entering through your firewall. 
Detects and automatically removes online threats. 
We defends against Web-based attacks with patent-dependent technology. 
The recovery tool is started and makes repairs badly infected PCs. 
It offers a thorough analysis and more thorough cleaning possible. 
Prevents bots from taking control of your computer. 
Norton Protection provides continuous protection continuous updates and new product features when they are available throughout the subscription period for your product, and helps you keep your computer protected against the latest Internet threats and risks. 
The service of automatic renewal of Norton you sure you're protected by automatically renewing your product subscription before it expires. 

Norton Identity secured by: 

Keeps your online identity safe to buy, browse, and game online. 
Advanced protection against phishing keeps your personal identification out of the hands of fraudulent Web pages. 
Stores and encrypts your passwords and other confidential data. 
Fill out your application forms online to save time and protect you from keystroke loggers. 

Control without disruptions: 

It puts all the elements of security to your fingertips. 
New. Program for resource intensive tasks for when you use your computer. 
Review the security status of every process on the computer. 
Silent mode suspends alerts and updates to avoid interrupting or reducing games or movies. 
The intelligent two-way firewall automatically makes security decisions for you. 

Network Protection: 

Secure your home network. 
Hides and protects your computer in public Wi-Fi networks. 

Parental Control: 

Create individual user profiles with greater parental control. 

Spam Blocking: 

Against spam filters are better than ever.
